exampleNotes.title: Definition of Done
exampleNotes.content: Each task you have here should be made with the following procedure: - For each ticket, you should create a separate branch from the master branch

exampleNotes.title: Layout of page
exampleNotes.content: List of hardcoded notes (each note should have a title and short content), - Add button,- Edit button for each note,- Delete button for each note

exampleNotes.title: Create note
exampleNotes.content: - Subject/Title of Note ( required field ), - The content of note limited to 300 characters (required field).

exampleNotes.title: Edit note
exampleNotes.content: When a user clicks on edit, the same modal as Add note should be displayed with the same rules with few changes - Instead of Add Button, there should be an Edit button.

exampleNotes.title: Delete note
exampleNotes.content: When a user clicks on delete button, confirmation modal should be displayed with a question Delete note title* ?
